archimate:Requirement.name: IR.2.5.9a: a) assessed individually and collectively, to determine how a combination of different but associated risks relate to the organisation's risk appetite (sometimes referred to as risk aggregation)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
